expected_normal_coords = np.array([[20.0, 21.0, 22.0], [20.0, 21.0, 22.0],
    [20.0, 21.0, 22.0]])
try:
    np.testing.assert_equal(self.formatter.get_coords_by_format(self.
        all_verts, IndicesFormat.N3F), expected_normal_coords)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
